segments.text: Have we handed out all the water ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . So what else to do now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nothing . The teacher said the only thing left was to get back all the disposable cups later .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . How do you like the game ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Terrific . There is one girl said , It is the best game I've ever watched .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Who do you think do better ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Clive was really outstanding . Not only he put on a big show himself , but also he inspired the whole team .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: On the other hand , I think the other team won everyone's respect . The leader said they could have crumpled at the beginning , but they just carried on and never lost their cool .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The thing I like most about them is that they did not play with a heavy heart even though at that time the odds seemed to be against them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can't agree more . Okay , time is up . Let's do the last thing .
segments.speaker: S2
